item.description:
Branford is having their Reataurant Week from June 3rd through June 9th. Just like New Haven participating restaurants are offering terrific fixed price menus. We have chosen Campania Ristorante and Taverna for our meet-up event.  The price is $29 for three courses.  Drinks are additional.  

 Begin your Italian Culinary Journey at Campania

 

Nestled in a renovated home in Branford, our goal at Campania is to provide a warm, friendly, home-like atmosphere. We serve the finest, freshest Italian American cuisine, feature a full wine list and the best spirits available. Whether a romantic dinner for two or a large family gathering – Campania is the perfect location.You can choose to dine in our cozy dining room, at our spacious bar or in the summer time enjoy the sun and food in our outdoor pergola and patio. Our menus feature a cuisine rich in both flavor and history from the Campania region of Italy and are accented with new and creative specialties created expressly by Chef Ron Solevo. Campanias Ristorante blends tradition with creativity in a friendly, warm environment.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Campania Ristorante and Taverna for Branford's Restaurant Week
